trans-unit.source: Regular garbage removal is necessary for the proper functioning of a home.

seg-source.mrk: Regular garbage removal is necessary for the proper functioning of a home.

target.mrk: Regular garbage removal is necessary for the proper functioning of a home.

trans-unit.source: Your municipality collects garbage from homes once a week, usually early in the morning.

seg-source.mrk: Your municipality collects garbage from homes once a week, usually early in the morning.

target.mrk: Your municipality collects garbage from homes once a week, usually early in the morning.

trans-unit.source: Find out from the town what day of the week garbage is collected in your neighborhood.

seg-source.mrk: Find out from the town what day of the week garbage is collected in your neighborhood.

target.mrk: Find out from the town what day of the week garbage is collected in your neighborhood.

trans-unit.source: The night before collection, place the garbage cans on the curb.

seg-source.mrk: The night before collection, place the garbage cans on the curb.

target.mrk: The night before collection, place the garbage cans on the curb.

trans-unit.source: After the garbage has been collected, move the cans back into your garage.

seg-source.mrk: After the garbage has been collected, move the cans back into your garage.

target.mrk: After the garbage has been collected, move the cans back into your garage.
